name: URLSessionDownloadTask
desc: A URL session task that stores downloaded data to file.

items.name: downloadTask
items.desc: Creates a download task that retrieves the contents of the specified URL and saves the results to a file.

items.name: downloadTask
items.desc: Creates a download task that retrieves the contents of a URL based on the specified URL request object and saves the results to a file.

items.name: downloadTask
items.desc: Creates a download task to resume a previously canceled or failed download.
